SEARCH
模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.model

类 Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Card
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
直接已知子类:
InitialCard, ResourceCard
public class Card extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a card in the game. This class holds the card's code, orientation, and corner elements. It provides methods to manipulate and access these attributes. It also includes methods to check the type of card.

  • 字段详细资料

    • corners

      public Map<CornerPosition,Elements> corners
      The elements present at the corners of the card. Uses CornerPosition as keys and Elements as values.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Card

      public Card()
      Constructs a new Card with default values.

    • Card

      public Card(int code)
      Constructs a new Card with the specified code.
      参数:
      code - the unique code of the card

    • Card

      public Card(int code, boolean isFront, Map<CornerPosition,Elements> corners)
      Constructs a new Card with the specified code, orientation, and corner elements.
      参数:
      code - the unique code of the card
      isFront - the orientation of the card
      corners - the elements at the corners of the card

  • 方法详细资料

    • getCode

      public int getCode()
      Gets the unique code of the card.
      返回:
      the code of the card

    • setCode

      public void setCode(int code)
      Sets the unique code of the card.
      参数:
      code - the code to set

    • getIsFront

      public boolean getIsFront()
      Gets the orientation of the card.
      返回:
      true if the card is facing front, false otherwise

    • setFront

      public void setFront(boolean front)
      Sets the orientation of the card.
      参数:
      front - true to set the card facing front, false otherwise

    • getCorners

      public Map<CornerPosition,Elements> getCorners()
      Gets the elements at the corners of the card.
      返回:
      a map of corner positions and their corresponding elements

    • setCorners

      public void setCorners(Map<CornerPosition,Elements> corners)
      Sets the elements at the corners of the card.
      参数:
      corners - a map of corner positions and their corresponding elements to set

    • isGoldCard

      public boolean isGoldCard()
      Checks if the card is a GoldCard.
      返回:
      true if the card is a GoldCard, false otherwise

    • isResourceCard

      public boolean isResourceCard()
      Checks if the card is a ResourceCard.
      返回:
      true if the card is a ResourceCard, false otherwise

    • isInitialCard

      public boolean isInitialCard()
      Checks if the card is an InitialCard.
      返回:
      true if the card is an InitialCard, false otherwise

    • getKingdom

      public Elements getKingdom()
      Gets the kingdom element associated with the card.
      返回:
      the kingdom element, or null if none
